reviews.comment: Miniatures are never the most economic option, but a neat way to sample the different versions/maturity at a relatively reasonable price, certainly cheaper than 3 full bottles!
reviews.title: Not bad value

reviews.comment: Nice to try the 3 years. Then I had to order the 18yr old from Amazon. So amazing. way above my normal price, so will be kept for an occasion.
reviews.title: Good Value

reviews.comment: Excellent birthday gift for a whiskey lover. Brilliant that you get a selection of three for people like me that don’t know whiskey at all and wouldn’t know which 1 bottle to buy.
reviews.title: Value for money

reviews.comment: Please be aware the photo shows the 12 14 15 year old whisky the 2 boxes I received were 12 15 18 year old. I bought as gifts so not a big problem but I did want to try the 14 year old before I bought the 70cl size but that’s not going to happen and I’m not sure I’ll receive the right age whisky if I did order. Not happy.
reviews.title: Photo incorrect

reviews.comment: This was a gift. Not sure yet what it is like. I thought bottles samples small.
reviews.title: Samples small
